name: venn.js
author: Ben Frederickson <ben@benfrederickson.com> (http:/www.benfrederickson.com)
description: Area Proportional Venn and Euler Diagrams

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -g d3-selection:d3,d3-transition:d3 -f umd -n venn -o build/venn.js -- index.js && cp build/venn.js .
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/venn.js -c -m -o build/venn.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/venn.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/venn.js build/venn.min.js
